lead_paragraph: Bo Van Pelt shot a six-under-par 66 at the Buick Open in Grand Blanc, Mich., giving him a two-shot lead after two rounds and a career-best 14-under 130 through 36 holes. Daniel Chopra (67) and Dudley Hart (68) are at 12 under. Rocco Mediate (69) made the cut at four under in his first tournament since losing to Tiger Woods in a playoff at the United States Open.
